headline: HONEYWELL COMPLETES SALE OF PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT BUSINESS TO PROTECTIVE INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTS
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., - Honeywell today announced it has completed the sale of its Personal Protective Equipment business to Protective Industrial Products, Inc. for $1.325 billion in an all-cash...
